definition: see 早知今日何必當初|早知今日何必当初[zao3 zhi1 jin1 ri4 he2 bi4 dang1 chu1]
pinyin: ji4 you3 jin1 ri4 he2 bi4 dang1 chu1

definition: if I (you, she, he...) had known it would come to this, I (you, she, he...) would not have acted thus (idiom)/to regret vainly one's past behavior
pinyin: zao3 zhi1 jin1 ri4 he2 bi4 dang1 chu1

definition: There is no need to boast about one's treasures. (idiom)
pinyin: you3 bao3 he2 bi4 ren2 qian2 kua1

sentences.english: Stop weeping for such an unthankful man like him!
sentences.chinese: 何必为他没良心的人哭泣呢？

sentences.english: China is always the price taker not price setter.
sentences.chinese: 中国何必猴子屁股一样总是红彤彤的呢？

sentences.english: We are just ordinary people, why to want to so great.
sentences.chinese: 莪们都只是普通人，何必把自己想旳那么伟大。

sentences.english: Human beings, why and hoodwink their own feelings.
sentences.chinese: 人类，何必欺骗自己的感情。

sentences.english: Why to pursue those eager evaluation?
sentences.chinese: 又何必追求那些急功近利的评价？

sentences.english: If thou regret'st thy youth, why live?
sentences.chinese: 假如青春岁月令你后悔，何必苟活下去？

sentences.english: Why should you turn over the pages of my book?
sentences.chinese: 清风不识字，何必乱翻书？

sentences.english: You are your own life of the author, why put the script written suffer unspeakably.
sentences.chinese: 你是你自己人生的作者，何必要把剧本写得苦不堪言。

sentences.english: Oneself are beautiful, said, flower flower also is drunk, why attached to an end?
sentences.chinese: 己说，花开是美，花落亦是醉，何必执着于一种结局？

sentences.english: Why use plastic when you can use wood?
sentences.chinese: 既然能用朔料，何必非要用木料呢？

sentences.english: You all do not stay, I again why a self-deception again.
sentences.chinese: 迩毕竟没有一句挽留，我又何必再自欺欺人。

sentences.english: But when the disciples saw it, they were indignant, saying, Why this waster?
sentences.chinese: 门徒看见，就恼怒说，何必这样枉费。

sentences.english: If you see the first signs of life, and why should bear the tea cool love.
sentences.chinese: 人生之若如初见，又何必承受人走茶凉的心疼。

sentences.english: Do I why the absence for give up the reputation credit and riches of doing the regal concubine as a maidservant.
sentences.chinese: 我何必为一个婢女放弃做妃子的荣华富贵呢。

sentences.english: I'm simply an accident. Why take it all so seriously?
sentences.chinese: 我只是一个事故。何必如此认真对待它呢？

sentences.english: Acquired shall not old, why envy Pang.
sentences.chinese: 后天应不老，何必羡彭年。

definition: why bother?/is it worth the trouble?
worthwhile (often in rhetorical questions, implying not worthwhile)/also written 犯得上
see 犯不著|犯不着[fan4 bu5 zhao2]
to do more than is required (idiom); superfluous/gilding the lily
(followed by a verb phrase, then – optionally – 不可, or 不行 etc) must
to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
to bother about/to haggle/to bicker/to argue/plan/stratagem
